碌: (ろく) - Satisfatório, satisfatório, decente, bom, adequado, digno
碌々: (ろくろく) - hardly; barely; inadequately (with negative grammatical constructions)
碌すっぽう: (ろくすっぽう) - (before neg. verb) (not) enough; (in)sufficiently; (un)satisfactorily
碌な: (ろくな) - (usually used in the negative sense) satisfactory; decent
碌碌: (ろくろく) - hardly; barely; inadequately (with negative grammatical constructions)
碑: (hi) - tombstone , stone monument bearing an inscription (especialmente memorial para as futuras gerações), stele, stela
碧々: (あおあお) - (often 青々として) verdant; fresh and green; bright green; lush
碧い: (あおい) - blue/green; (青い, 蒼い only) pale; (青い, 蒼い only) unripe/inexperienced
碧水: (へきすい) - blue water; green water
碧眼紅毛: (へきがんこうもう) - (yoji) blue eyes and red hair; Westerner
碧碧: (あおあお) - (often 青々として) verdant; fresh and green; bright green; lush
碧空: (へきくう) - blue sky; azure sky
碧雲: (へきうん) - bluish cloud; azure sky/blue sky
碩学: (せきがく) - great scholar; profound scholar
碩老: (せきろう) - wise and learned elder
碰: (ほう) - Colidir, formando um pung ao pegar uma peça descartada por outro jogador
確か: (tashika) - certeiro, certo, positivo, definido; confiável, digno de confiança, seguro, sólido, firme, preciso, correto, exato, certo, certo, positivo, definido; confiável, digno de confiança, seguro, sólido, firme, preciso, correto, exato; Se não me engano, Se me lembro corretamente, Se me lembro bem
確かそうだ: (たしかそうだ) - that's probably so
確かなものにする: (たしかなものにする) - to strengthen; to beef up; to put on a firm basis; to ensure; to secure
確かな物にする: (たしかなものにする) - to strengthen; to beef up; to put on a firm basis; to ensure; to secure
確かめる: (たしかめる) - to ascertain; to check; to make sure
確かめ算: (たしかめざん) - checking (e.g. result of calculation)
確からしさ: (たしからしさ) - probability; likelihood; chances
確たる: (かくたる) - certain; definite; clear; credible
確たる証拠: (かくたるしょうこ) - certain evidence; definite evidence
確と: (しっかと) - certainly/for sure; distinctly/clearly/exactly; firmly/tightly
確り: (しっかり) - tightly (holding on)/firmly/securely; strongly (built)/solidly/sturdily/steadily; properly/well/sufficiently/hard (working, etc.)/fully/completely; reliably/dependably/levelheadedly/shrewdly/wisely/cleverly
確り者: (しっかりもの) - person of firm character; stable person; gutsy person
確乎不抜: (かっこふばつ) - (yoji) determined; steadfast; unswerving; unshakable
確保: (かくほ) - guarantee; maintain; ensure; insure; secure; reservation
確信犯: (かくしんはん) - crime of conscience; (originally considered an incorrect usage) premeditated crime/act carried out while knowing that it should not be
確固不動: (かっこふどう) - (yoji) unshakeable (e.g. belief); invincible; steadfastness; firmness; unwavering (e.g. support); absolutely secure
確報: (かくほう) - definite report; confirmed data
確変: (かくへん) - stochastic variable; random variable
確定事項: (かくていじこう) - fixed content; settled matter; done deal
確定判決: (かくていはんけつ) - final decision
確定利付証券: (かくていりつきしょうけん) - fixed interest-bearing securities
確定力: (かくていりょく) - {law} power of finality (of a legal decision, e.g. when a case is dismissed with prejudice)
確定拠出型年金: (かくていきょしゅつがたねんきん) - defined-contribution pension
確定拠出年金: (かくていきょしゅつねんきん) - defined contribution pension plan
確定申告: (かくていしんこく) - final income tax return; final declaration; final report
確定的過程: (かくていてきかてい) - deterministic process
確定給付型年金: (かくていきゅうふがたねんきん) - defined-benefit pension
確定裁判: (かくていさいばん) - {law} final decision
確実性係数: (かくじつせいけいすう) - certainty factor
確率変数: (かくりつへんすう) - stochastic variable; random variable
確率密度関数: (かくりつみつどかんすう) - probability density function
確率標本: (かくりつひょうほん) - random sample
確立: (かくりつ) - establishment/settlement; to establish/to settle
